item.description:
Light Bites for Dinner:  Please bring a dish to share!  BYOB!

 

The Auction

Please bring some things you no longer want that are in really good shape such as costume jewelry, hats, articles of clothing, household items, etc.  Anything goes. 

How it works:

Each of you will be given a limited amount of fake money before the auction begins.  

You will use your fake money allotment to bid on an a particular item that someone else brought that you desire.  BEWARE!  Other ladies may desire the same thing.

The item will go to the highest bidder!

The only way you can get more money to use so that you can bid on more items in the auction, besides the amount initially given, is from the items you brought that sell at the auction.

So be Wise.  Bring good stuff.  No junk please.  Anything that does not sell goes home with you!

Lets have a few laughs, a good time, and lots of food as usual!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Light bites for dinner-- and Auction!
